import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo'')

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo'')
from src.thickness_data_loader import ThicknessDataProcessor

for rate in [0.3, 0.5, 0.7]:
    print(f''\n========== 最小出现率 = {rate*100:.0f}% =========='')
    processor = ThicknessDataProcessor(merge_coal=False)
    result = processor.process_directory(
        ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo/data'',
        layer_method=''position_based'',
        min_occurrence_rate=rate
    )
    print(f''总层数: {len(result[""layer_order""])}'')
")

import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo'')
from src.thickness_data_loader import ThicknessDataProcessor
import io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8'')

print(''Test different occurrence rate thresholds:'')
print(''=''*50)
for rate in [0.3, 0.5, 0.6, 0.7]:
    processor = ThicknessDataProcessor(merge_coal=False)
    result = processor.process_directory(
        ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo/data'',
        layer_method=''position_based'',
        min_occurrence_rate=rate
    )
    print(f''Rate >= {rate*100:.0f}%: {len(result[""layer_order""])} layers'')

print()
print(''Compare with simple method:'')
processor = ThicknessDataProcessor(merge_coal=False)
result = processor.process_directory(
    ''E:/xiangmu/dizhijianmo/data'',
    layer_method=''simple''
)
print(f''Simple method: {len(result[""layer_order""])} layers'')
")
